Description: Unique 1-bed/1-bath condo over two floors that lives like a small house in Somerville. One block to Gilman Station/green line with easy commute to downtown Boston. Updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas stove, microwave, dishwasher and fridge. Open concept living/dining room space. Bedroom with vaulted ceilings and updated bathroom with new vanity, glass shower and new tiling throughout. Free laundry plus storage in-basement. Central AC. Small dedicated front porch. Parking on-street by permit only. Small pets negotiable. Available 9/1. First, security and brokers.
